### Methods
Data for this analysis comes from several sources. Fishery harvest data for both the municipal and commercial sectors was obtained from the CountrySTAT Philippines [data portal](http://countrystat.psa.gov.ph/). 

Prices by region and species were calculated seperately for the municipal and commercial sectors as a catch-weighted average price.
